response.headline: Takaragawa Onsen hot spring resort in Minakami, Japan with natural river setting and stone walls
response.summary: Takaragawa Onsen in Minakami offers a traditional Japanese hot spring experience with natural stone retaining walls along a flowing river. The location has 229.5K likes across posts, indicating its popularity as a travel destination.
